description: M a d k h a l   i l a ́   d i r a ̄ s a t   a l - T a w r a ̄ h   w a - n a q d i h a ̄   m a ʻ a   t a r j a m a t i h a ̄   a l - ʻ A r a b i ̄ y a h   ( S a ʻ a d i a   G a o n ' s   t r a n s l a t i o n   o f   t h e   P e n t a t e u c h   i n t o   A r a b i c )
title: Madkhal ilá dirāsat al-Tawrāh wa-naqdihā maʻa tarjamatihā al-ʻArabīyah (Saʻadia Gaon's translation of the Pentateuch into Arabic)
author: Saʻadia ben Joseph
